On Jun 20, 2017 10:02 AM, "Todd Wang" ***@***.***> wrote:
 Thanks for the bug report @pvanhaes <https://github.com/pvanhaes>. I've
 reproduced the issue, and agree with your analysis.

 I think there are two ways to fix this; we can either:

    1. Ensure that tf.reduce_* resolves negative axis arguments into
    positive (in-range) arguments (see https://github.com/tensorflow/
    tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/math_ops.py#L1190
    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/math_ops.py#L1190>),
    or
    2. Change tf.gather to allow negative indices

 I think (2) sounds reasonable. Assigning to @ebrevdo
 <https://github.com/ebrevdo>, who seems to have some familiarity with
 tf.gather.
